name: Super Maja Run
description:
In this great platform game you play Super Maja. It is a simple tap game, but hard to master. The characters runs automatically, and all you have to do is to jump at the right moments.
You collect coins in the game, which you can use to unlock characters or buy super powers. You have 9 different characters you can play.

Single tap = single jump.
Dobble tap = dobble jump.
Tripple tap = tripple jump.

Invisible mode = You can run through enemies.
Shoot = Shoot at enemies.
Red Shoe = High speed and super jump.
